overview: Scene one: Tyler Morgan and Stephen Charles  A simple good morning turns into a fuckfest!  Scene two: Colt Rivers and Andrew Justice  Hey buddy, let me take care of that muscle cramp for ya!  Scene three: Liam Harkmoore and Dylan Knight  They share more than just a place to live.  Scene four: Mike DeMarko and Wolfie Blue  A quick becomes a sweaty, sex-filled sex session.
title: My Straight Roommate 15
